title: Boosted players should be banned from playing league of legends
body: Why is it that league allow's players to get boosted to gold/plat/ and so on, why are they allowed to play a boosted account in ranked when they dont even know how to play and getting people a loss in ranked is bs i think because ranked should be for players who have been playing worked their way up to be able to play ranked. I think boosted accounts should be banned.

replies.body: If they don't deserve it if they get boosted, they will end up demoting anyways, so it doesn't really matter and you cant actually tell whose boosting someone because someone could just be playing with their friends.
but when the boosted person plays solo, and they loose 10 games in a row, just throwing out a number, then thats 45 people who lost LP because of that guy.
If you can't recover from one unwinnable game, then you probably don't deserve to be where you are.

I am just saying, it still isnt fair the people for having to put up with a 4v5. Even if it is one game. It could be a series game, and they could lose it because of the boosted. There are a lot of variables to it yes, but i am just saying in general.
Yeah, it sucks, but frustrating unwinnable games will always be a part of the game, because everyone has bad games and can single-handedly lose a game, not just boosted players.

Umm, you are silver 4. How can you complain when you are pretty much at the bottom of the ladder. Also, this is rarely ever a problem. I've played with only 5 or so actual boosted players. You have to realize that just because the players you are playing with are bad doesn't mean that they are boosted. You yourself play bad and deserve to be low elo with other people that play bad.

Dont be a prick. Nothing about his rank changes his point. He doesn't even need to be talking about dealing with boosted players himself, just that its a actual problem that needs to be addressed.

> just that its a actual problem that needs to be addressed.

But it is when it's an actual case of boosting, which is someone else playing on a persons account and ranking it up. Not what people continue to whine about when people are carried from one rank to another when still using their own account.

Boosting isn't a big problem though. I haven't experienced this as a regular occurrence with actual boosted players in my games. Just because someone plays bad a game, doesn't mean that they are boosted. He made this post out of spite of the "bad" players he gets in his games.

The issue is there is no way to tell if someone is boosted or not at a glace, nor a way to prove it. 

There are also two kinds of boosted, and only one of those is actually considered cheating, and therefore is legitimately ban-able. Theres the account buying kind, where someone buys a high level account, and then theres the carried boosted, where someone plays together with a high leveled friend and gets carried to a high level. You can't ban someone for playing, and winning, ranked games and getting to plat or diamond themselves just because they happened to be playing with a friend.

When I made this post I was doing Very well in my gain to gold, that prick talking like its about rank in league when its me asking, "Why is it that league allow's players to get boosted to gold/plat/ and so on, " but that's all I did  and just wanted to know if or not they banned or why are so many overlooked when its obvious they were.


Btw PuffyP all because im in silver doesn't mean im not as good or better than you at the game so i would be alittle nicer to ppl you dont know mate k cool.
Boosted players are banned when their account is flagged for inspection and it is determined that the player was boosted.
To be fair, it's in the ToS that account sharing is bannable, so... yeah, it kind of already is?
